title: September 11 Attacks
summary: Coordinated terrorist attacks in New York and Washington that reshaped global security and foreign policy.

title: War in Afghanistan Begins
summary: US-led invasion following 9/11 to dismantle al-Qaeda and remove the Taliban from power.

title: Iraq War
summary: US-led invasion of Iraq that destabilized the region and reshaped Middle Eastern geopolitics.

title: Facebook Founded
summary: Launch of Facebook, accelerating the rise of social media and digital identity.

title: Indian Ocean Tsunami
summary: Massive tsunami caused by an undersea earthquake, killing over 200,000 people.

title: Hurricane Katrina
summary: Devastating hurricane that exposed deep social and infrastructural failures in the US.

title: Global Financial Crisis
summary: Worldwide financial collapse triggered by the US housing bubble and banking failures.

title: Election of Barack Obama
summary: Barack Obama becomes the first Black president of the United States.

title: Arab Spring
summary: Wave of protests and uprisings challenging authoritarian regimes across the Arab world.

title: Fukushima Nuclear Disaster
summary: Nuclear meltdown following a major earthquake and tsunami, reigniting global nuclear debates.

title: Death of Osama bin Laden
summary: Leader of al-Qaeda killed by US forces after a decade-long manhunt.

title: Syrian Civil War Begins
summary: Conflict that evolved from protests into a prolonged and devastating civil war.

title: Edward Snowden NSA Leaks
summary: Revelations of mass government surveillance sparked global privacy debates.

title: ISIS Declares Caliphate
summary: Extremist group seizes territory across Iraq and Syria, escalating regional instability.

title: Russia Annexes Crimea
summary: Russia’s annexation of Crimea heightens tensions with Ukraine and the West.

title: Paris Climate Agreement
summary: International agreement to limit global warming and address climate change.

title: Brexit Referendum
summary: UK votes to leave the European Union, reshaping European politics.

title: Election of Donald Trump
summary: Donald Trump elected US president amid populist and nationalist movements.

title: MeToo Movement
summary: Global movement exposing sexual harassment and power abuse.

title: Cambridge Analytica Scandal
summary: Data misuse scandal revealing political manipulation through social media.

title: COVID-19 Pandemic
summary: Global pandemic that disrupted societies, economies, and daily life worldwide.

title: George Floyd Protests
summary: Nationwide protests against police brutality and systemic racism.

title: US Capitol Attack
summary: Attack on the US Capitol challenging democratic norms and election legitimacy.

title: Taliban Return to Power
summary: Taliban regain control following US withdrawal.

title: Russia Invades Ukraine
summary: Full-scale invasion triggering Europe’s largest war since WWII.

title: Global Inflation Crisis
summary: Post-pandemic inflation spikes affecting living costs worldwide.

title: ChatGPT Released
summary: Public release of ChatGPT accelerates mainstream adoption of generative AI.

title: SVB Bank Collapse
summary: Major US bank collapse reignites fears of financial instability.

title: Israel–Gaza War Escalation
summary: Renewed large-scale conflict intensifies humanitarian and geopolitical tensions.

title: AI Regulation Push
summary: Governments move to regulate artificial intelligence amid rapid adoption.
